elements.name: User verify all items are present in Desktops tab

steps.name: User click on Show all desktops
User should see all items are present in Desktop page

elements.name: User add HP LP 3065  from Desktops tab to the cart

steps.name: User click on Show all desktops
User click  ADD TO CART option on HP LP3065item
User click add to Cart button
User should see a message 'Success: You have added HP LP3065 to your shopping cart!'

arguments.val: 'Success: You have added HP LP3065 to your shopping cart!'

elements.name: User add Canon EOS 5D from Desktops tab to the cart

steps.name: User click on Show all desktops
User click  ADD TO CART option on Canon EOS 5D Camera
User click add to Cart button
User should see a Message 'Success: You have added Canon EOS 5D Camera to your shopping cart!'

arguments.val: 'Success: You have added Canon EOS 5D Camera to your shopping cart!'

elements.name: User add a review to Canon EOS 5D item in Desktops tab

steps.name: User click on Show all desktops
User click on Canon EOS 5D Camera
User click on write a review link
user fill the review information with below information

cells: My review is very very good! Thank you for very good camera

steps.name: User should see a message with 'Thank you for your review. It has been submitted to the webmaster for approval.'

arguments.val: 'Thank you for your review. It has been submitted to the webmaster for approval.'

steps.name: currency value should change to Euro

elements.name: User empty Shopping cart message displays

steps.name: 'Your shopping cart is empty!' message should display
User click on Show all Laptop &NoteBook option

elements.name: Add and Remove a Mac book from Cart

steps.name: User should see Message 'Success: You have added MacBook to your shopping cart!'

arguments.val: 'Success: You have added MacBook to your shopping cart!'

steps.name: User should see 1 item(s)-602.00 showed to the cart
user click on red X button to remove the item from cart
item should be removed and cart should show 0 item(s)
User click on Show all Laptop &NoteBook option
User click on product comparison icon on MacBook
User click on product comparison icon MacBook Air
User should see success a message 'Success: You have added MacBook Air to your product comparison!'

arguments.val: 'Success: You have added MacBook Air to your product comparison!'

steps.name: User click on Product comparison link
User should see Product Comparison Chart
User click on Show all Laptop &NoteBook option

elements.name: Adding an item to Wish list

steps.name: User click on heart icon to add Sony VaIO laptop to wish list
User should get a message 'You must login or create an account to save Sony VAIO to your wish list!'

arguments.val: 'You must login or create an account to save Sony VAIO to your wish list!'

steps.name: User click on Show all Laptop &NoteBook option

elements.name: Validate the price of MacBook Pro is 2000

steps.name: User should see  '$2,000.00' price tag is present on UI.
User should be logged in to MyAccount dashboard

elements.name: Register as an Affiliate user with Cheque Payment Method

steps.name: User click on Register for an Affiliate Account link
User fill affiliate form with below information
User check on About us check box
User should be logged in to MyAccount dashboard

elements.name: Edit your affiliate information from Cheque payment method to Bank Transfer

steps.name: User click on Edit your affiliate information link
user click on Bank Transfer radio button
User fill Bank information with below information
User should be logged in to MyAccount dashboard
User click on Edit your account information link
User should see message 'Success: Your account has been successfully updated.'

arguments.val: 'Success: Your account has been successfully updated.'
